title: Scripts Specification
description: The Scripts file is a YAML file defining how rusty hooks should run your scripts.

name.description: Script name. Distinct from script file name

script.description: Inline bash script to run. If this is specified, file_name will be ignored.

dependencies.description: List of scripts that must complete successfully before running this script.

file_name.description: Relative path to script file. Assumes the scripts and config json are all located within the one folder passed as an argument on startup.

watch_path.description: Absolute path to directory to watch for changes.

enabled.description: Whether or not to run this script.

event_triggers.description: List of events that will trigger the script to run. Optional, defaults to all events.

run_delay.description: Time (in seconds) to wait after a change is detected before running the script. Optional, defaults to 0.
